sentence.Network_en: The precursor of dinosteranes were dinoflagellate algae developed in the saline and brackish water environments.

abstract Non-marine dinoflagellate fossil of middle cretaceous is very rare in the world .中白垩世非海相沟鞭藻化石在世界上极为罕见。
Many dinoflagellates are harmless , but some produce neurotoxins ., 很多鞭毛藻是无害的 , 但是有些会产生神经毒素.
...有毒涡鞭毛藻（toxic dinoflagellate）是一类会产生毒素的涡鞭毛藻(甲藻门)，日本的长崎，美国的华盛顿皆有繁殖。现存的海洋藻类约有19,000－25,000种，其中有30－40种涡鞭毛藻含有毒性成分，最常见的是麻痹性贝毒，一旦鱼类或人类不当食用有毒涡鞭毛藻，毒素不会排出体外，长年蓄积在体内。== 分.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (as an adjective): from modern Latin Dinoflagellata (plural), from Greek dinos 'whirling' + Latin flagellum 'small whip' (see flagellum)

means.word_mean: 1. chiefly marine protozoa having two flagella; a chief constituent of plankton
